user_profile.name: Michael Thompson
user_profile.description: Michael is a 50-year-old professional with an intermediate understanding of technology, navigating his way through a digital world that often feels overwhelming. As a reserved individual, he values clear and concise communication and has a carefully measured approach to learning new skills, especially in moments that feel urgent. He is motivated to teach his parent video calling, as he believes it will enhance their connection while maintaining a balance between his cautious nature and the modern demands of communication.
